DataElement.preferredName: Multiple Small Lesion Appearance and/or Disappearance Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not there are multiple appearance or disappearance of small lesions.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Multiple Small Lesion Appearance And/Or Negation Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having, relating to, or consisting of more than one individual, element, part, or other component; manifold._Limited in number, quantity, magnitude or extent._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable
